DataElement.preferredName: Person Quality of Life Complete Agreement Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a person agreed to complete a quality of life questionnaire, an evaluation of an individual's physical health, psychological state, level of independence, social relationships, personal beliefs and their relationships to salient features of the environment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Quality of Life Complete Agreement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person agreeing to complete a quality of life questionnaire, an evaluatio of an individual's physical health, psychological state, level of independence, social relationships, personal beliefs and their relationships to salient features of the environment.

Property.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.:1. The act of agreeing. 2. Harmony of opinion; accord. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient completed or does the patient intend to complete the quality of life questionnaires

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient agreed to complet
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient agreed to complete Quality of Life questionnaires

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to complete the lymphedema questionnaires, have arm measurements taken and to have BMI calculated for the research described in the protocol.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to take part in the geriatric assessment study described and complete three questionnaires.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent for AYA Hears?
